title: Limeade Oreo Cookie Review - Oreo Oration
description:
Is there a new king of Limeade?

This episode is because of your support on Patreon. Thank you: http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE / BUY A SHIRT: http://www.districtlines.com/kindafunny

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Whenever a noteworthy cookie comes, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review: http://www.youtube.com/user/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Check out the Oreo Oration FAQ: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aO6zw2LeJ3c&list=PLOlEpGVXWUVseSo6bQHB1ad2cN_qV3aXs&index=1

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody Welcome to Oreo Oration I'm Greg Miller and while you were out living your life the fine people at Nabisco, makers of Oreo cookies, are making endless variations to milk's favorite cookie so whenever a new cool flavor comes around and thanks to your support on Patreon I tear open a new package and give you a tasty review without any calories if you like that like the video share us with your friends and subscribe to Kinda Funny on YouTube today we're reviewing Limeade Oreos now here's the thing ladies and gentlemen these neon green things have been all up in the news people have been tweeting me for a while now saying where you get the L what the thing about it Oreo of course is crazy we've known this for a while they they they they're just insane over there putting out new flavors all the time I have no idea why lime is one I would have never predicted I of course am from the Chicagoland area went to school in Missouri limeade of course to me is Sonic I I didn't think many people knew about lime

no idea why lime is one I would have never predicted I of course am from the Chicagoland area went to school in Missouri limeade of course to me is Sonic I I didn't think many people knew about lime ads outside of that but here we are and it's all set to go uh of course every Oreo oration begins with the patented first look and there they are in all their neon glory of course the bouquet of any oration First Look is a big part here all right I'm getting no hints so far of limeade what I'm getting is the shortbread cookie you know it well from the oration if we look again at the first look it looks like we got screwed over we're missing a cookie there but they are all intact which is always a big part and who doesn't like that's always like leave some leave some room for for the Holy Ghost as they say um so yeah good first look they're all intact I wish the smell was a bit stronger but we can uh jump officially right to taste there's a lot going on it's more complex than you think

as they say um so yeah good first look they're all intact I wish the smell was a bit stronger but we can uh jump officially right to taste there's a lot going on it's more complex than you think when I first bit into it I was already ready to go nope but then it you mull it on your tongue a bit longer and you get that limeade taste here hold on it's very sweet I would say on on that last second bite there it felt like my tongue was having a seizure like it was like vibrating around cuz there was so much going on still it's still cooking that's it's dominated by the shortbread taste you look at it of course this is back to one of the ones like I was I said in the pumpkin spice one that they seem like they didn't they had a normal amount of Oreo filling when usually these crazy ass flavors have double stuffed amounts that's a double stuffed amount if I've ever seen one right there you're not tricking me Nabisco what it it reminds me of more than limeade like a sherbet it tastes it tastes

double stuffed amounts that's a double stuffed amount if I've ever seen one right there you're not tricking me Nabisco what it it reminds me of more than limeade like a sherbet it tastes it tastes like a when the green part of sherbet you know sherbet comes different colors it's got the Limey the lime taste I'm a bit perplexed I like the taste but I don't love it and I don't know where I would when would I eat this cookie at what point am I like craving a limeade right now ch's out in that uh yeah I don't know I don't understand you see then you you get a hard swallow there you get more lime taste I'm perplexed this is the first Oration where I am perplexed put it on the board perplexed let's see how pairs with milk of course a big part of the Oration here and my brand new mug districtlines.com kind of funny ah of course now we go to the most moment one two three I a go high pitched but whatever wow the whole thing just exploded in my hand again the milk seems like it's muting the taste

someone's 21st birthday they have these out there on a hot summer day all the girls are in white sundresses I'm in a sear sucker suit with a hat and a monocle and a little pipe I can see these are out there that makes sense it's a it's a light it's a light summery treat but at no point am I knocking down the door to Target and being like hey give me more of them limeades no doesn't happen the way so that's the way the cookie crumbles for limeade Oreos but ladies and gentlemen let me know what you think of this cookie tell me in the comments make sure you share this video with your friends uh the big thing you need to do is when you see Oreos in your neck of the woods let me know what they are so I can get them review them on the show continue our Oreo journey together uh call them out in the comments do everything like that go support us on Patreon that's the whole reason these episodes of Oreo Oration are happening thank you so much for that and then until next time keep on dunking
